title: New: a k u a – Told You So
body: Having impressed with her previous track [**Gravity**](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/20859-new-a-k-u-a-gravity/), future Canadian pop sensation **a k u a** is beginning to find her feet. With support from several top music blogs, her newest track _Told You So_ is sure to push her music to an even wider audience, especially with the release of a Twin Shadow produced EP out later in the year. Centred around an almost tribal-esque beat with her choppy vocals layered expertly over the top, **a k u a** is one of 2013’s hottest talents.
